post.summary: Creates a JWT token to call IAP services.
post.description: This endpoint creates a JWT token to call IAP services. Authorization can be a Bearer psToken,  Basic Base64 encoded username:password or Basic with apiKey.

parameters.name: X-API-Key
parameters.description: Api Key can be passed in header to generate a JWT.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: Optionally pass client Id from calling app to set as authorized party on JWT.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: OBSOLETE: api key should now be passed as as an X-API-Key header.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Optionally pass the domain name you are logging into

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data is a custom meta data field that will be applied to the session field in the JWT payload.

parameters.name: scopes
parameters.description: Scopes can be passed in during token generation to limit the token to particular scopes.

parameters.name: cwid
parameters.description: Set the current workgroup on the token. Used for aligning resources to a workgroup.

parameters.name: cid
parameters.description: Set the current context on the token. Used for aligning resources to a context.

parameters.name: returnSessionToken
parameters.description: By default, this endpoint returns a JWT token. You can specify returnSessionToken=true to get an Illumina psToken instead.

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request.

401.description: The acting identity cannot be authenticated and authorized.

403.description: The acting identity is not authorized to subscribe to the given event type or deliver to the given delivery target.

default.description: Unexpected issue. Please try your request again. If problem persists, please contact the system administrator.

delete.description: This endpoint revokes the access token that is passed in.

requestBody.description: Access token request accepts either a psToken or a JWT in the access_token field in the body of the request.

204.description: Succeeded and the token has been revoked.

400.description: An invalid or missing input parameter will result in a bad request."

version.description: Current version for the deployed service

ServiceHealthResponse.description: Describes the individual health of all services in the platform

SystemHealthResponse.description: The overall health of the platform

itemCount.description: Number of items included in the page

nextPageToken.description: PageToken for the next paged list

prevPageToken.description: PageToken for the previous paged list

lastPageToken.description: PageToken for the last paged list. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

totalItemCount.description: Total number of items in all pages. Only included when requested

totalPageCount.description: Total number of pages. Only included when totalItemCount is listed

isEnabled.description: True if the environment is enabled

access_token.description: The returned token is either a psToken or a JWT token depending on the context of the call.
This is either a psToken or a JWT token depending on the context of the call.

AccessTokenRequest.description: Access token passed into an api request

Bearer.description: Authorization header using Bearer scheme with token. Example: "Bearer {token}"
Bearer.name: Authorization
